creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: red/yellow, black border band; bordering green and black woven geometric pattern with wide red shot every 2-1/4" ; tin hat buttons at end of weaving--both sides and both ends; end borders are pink, green, white geometric machine embroidery; both ends have nine tassels attached by three silver glass beads--red/yellow
title: Belt
